sentences.sContent: But there was a price below which they dared not go, for it had happened that a fisherman in despair had given his pearls to the church.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there was a price below which they dared not go, for it had happened that a fisherman in despair had given his pearls to the church.
sentences.sCn: 但是有一个价格底线，他们不敢低于这个价格了，因为曾有渔夫因为价格太低而绝望得宁愿把珍珠募捐给教堂。

trans.tranOther: someone who catches fish as a sport or as a job
